mapper.select: SELECT P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME ,P.RANK_NO ,D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME ,D.UPPER_DEPT ,D.LEV ,M.NO AS NO ,M.NAME AS NAME FROM POSITION P JOIN DEPT D ON P.DEPT_NO = D.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO ORDER BY M.NO ASC

INSERT INTO SIGN_LINE (SL_NO ,E_NO ,S_NO ,S_LEVEL) SELECT SEQ_SIGN_LINE_NO.NEXTVAL, A.* FROM(
SELECT #{item.eNo} AS E_NO, #{item.sNo} AS S_NO, #{item.sLevel} AS S_LEVEL FROM DUAL ) A
mapper.update: UPDATE SIGN_LINE SET S_STEP = 'Y' WHERE E_NO = #{no}
mapper.select: WITH T1 AS (SELECT SL.S_NO AS S_NO, SL.S_LEVEL AS S_LEVEL, SL.S_STEP AS S_STEP,S.S_TITLE AS S_TITLE,S.S_DATE AS S_DATE,S.S_CONTENT,S.S_STATUS,S.A_NO FROM SIGN_LINE SL INNER JOIN SIGN S ON S.S_NO = SL.S_NO WHERE SL.E_NO = #{no} AND SL.S_STEP='N') SELECT * FROM T1 INNER JOIN SIGN_LINE SSL ON T1.S_NO = SSL.S_NO WHERE SSL.S_NO = T1.S_NO AND SSL.S_LEVEL = T1.S_LEVEL-1 AND SSL.S_STEP = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(S.S_NO) FROM SIGN S JOIN SIGN_LINE SL ON S.S_NO = SL.S_NO WHERE SL.S_STEP ='N' AND SL.E_NO = #{no}
